cast.overview: After proving himself on the field of battle in the French and Indian War, Benjamin Martin wants nothing more to do with such things, preferring the simple life of a farmer. But when his son Gabriel enlists in the army to defend their new nation, America, against the British, Benjamin reluctantly returns to his old life to protect his son.
cast.title: The Patriot

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Peter Woodward (born 24 January 1956) is a British actor, stuntman and screenwriter. He is probably best known for his role as Galen in the Babylon 5 spin-offs Babylon 5: A Call to Arms, Crusade and Babylon 5: The Lost Tales.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Peter Woodward, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.​
details.name: Peter Woodward
